name: Murkrow
flavorText:
Feared and loathed
by many, it is
believed to bring misfortune to all
those who see it
at night.

previous.name: Umbreon
previous.flavorText:
When agitated,
this POKéMON pro­
tects itself by spraying poisonous
sweat from its
pores.

next.name: Slowking
next.flavorText:
It has incredible
intellect and in­
tuition. Whatever the situation, it
remains calm and
collected.

pokemon.name: Honchkrow
pokemon.flavorText:
Becoming active at night, it is
known to swarm with numerous
MURKROW in tow.
